   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1,
   67:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   68:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   69: 
   70: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   72: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   73: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   74: 
   75: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   76:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   77:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   78:     )).
   79: 
   80: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   81:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   82:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   83:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   84:     )).
   85: 
   86: -record(rsm_in, {
   87:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   88:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   89:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   90:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   91:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   92:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   93:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   94:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   95:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   96:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   97:         }).
   98: 
   99: -record(forwarded_message, {
  100:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  101:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  102:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  103:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  104:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  105:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  106:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  107:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  108:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  109: }).
  110: 
  111: -record(result_iq, {
  112:     from            :: binary(),
  113:     to              :: binary(),
  114:     id              :: binary(),
  115:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  117:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  119: }).
  120: 
  121: -record(error_iq, {
  122:     id              :: binary(),
  123:     type            :: binary(),
  124:     error_type      :: binary(),
  125:     condition       :: binary(),
  126:     text            :: binary()
  127: }).
  128: 
  129: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  130:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  131:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  132:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  133: }).
  134: 
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: %% Suite configuration
  137: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  138: 
  139: muc_host() ->
  140:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  141: 
  142: host() ->
  143:     <<"localhost">>.
  144: 
  145: configurations() ->
  146:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  147:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  148: 
  149: odbc_configs(true) ->
  150:     [odbc,
  151:      odbc_async_pool,
  152:      odbc_mnesia,
  153:      odbc_dirty_mnesia,
  154:      odbc_async_cache,
  155:      odbc_cache,
  156:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  157:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  158: odbc_configs(_) ->
  159:     [].
  160: 
  161: riak_configs(true) ->
  162:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  163: riak_configs(_) ->
  164:      [].
  165: 
  166: basic_group_names() ->
  167:     [
  168:     mam,
  169:     mam_purge,
  170:     muc,
  171:     muc_with_pm,
  172:     rsm,
  173:     with_rsm,
  174:     muc_rsm,
  175:     bootstrapped,
  176:     archived,
  177:     policy_violation,
  178:     offline_message,
  179:     prefs_cases
  180:     ].
  181: 
  182: all() ->
  183:     Reasons =
  184:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  185:         false -> [require_odbc];
  186:         true  -> []
  187:     end,
  188:     case Reasons of
  189:         [] ->
  190:             tests();
  191:         [_|_] ->
  192:             {skip, Reasons}
  193:     end.
  194: 
  195: tests() ->
  196:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  197:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  198:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  199: 
  200: groups() ->
  201:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  202:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  203:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  204: 
  205: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  206:     false.
  207: 
  208: 
  209: basic_groups() ->
  210:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  211:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  212:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  213:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  214:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  215:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  216:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  217:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  218:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  219:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  220:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  221:      {prefs_cases,      [], [run_prefs_cases,
  222:                              run_set_and_get_prefs_cases]}].
  223: 
  224: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  225:      [purge_old_single_message,
  226:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  227: 
  228: mam_cases() ->
  229:     [mam_service_discovery,
  230:      simple_archive_request,
  231:      range_archive_request,
  232:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  233:      limit_archive_request,
  234:      prefs_set_request,
  235:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  236:      iq_spoofing].
  237: 
  238: mam_purge_cases() ->
  239:     [purge_single_message,
  240:      purge_multiple_messages].
  241: 
  242: archived_cases() ->
  243:     [archived,
  244:      strip_archived,
  245:      filter_forwarded].
  246: 
  247: policy_violation_cases() ->
  248:     [policy_violation].
  249: 
  250: offline_message_cases() ->
  251:     [offline_message].
  252: 
  253: muc_cases() ->
  254:     [muc_service_discovery,
  255:      muc_archive_request,
  256:      muc_archive_purge,
  257:      muc_multiple_devices,
  258:      muc_private_message,
  259:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  260:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  261:      ].
  262: 
  263: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  264:     rsm_cases().
  265: 
  266: with_rsm_cases() ->
  267:     rsm_cases().
  268: 
  269: rsm_cases() ->
  270:       [pagination_first5,
  271:        pagination_last5,
  272:        pagination_before10,
  273:        pagination_after10,
  274:        pagination_empty_rset,
  275:        %% Border cases
  276:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  277:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  278:        %% Simple cases
  279:        pagination_simple_before10,
  280:        %% opt_count cases
  281:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  282:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  283:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  284:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  285:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  286:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  287:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  288: 
  289: suite() ->
  290:     escalus:suite().
  291: 
  292: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  293:     delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  294:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)]).
  295: 
  296: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  297:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  298: 
  299: user_names() ->
  300:     [alice, bob, kate].
  301: 
  302: create_users(Config) ->
  303:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  304: 
  305: delete_users(Config) ->
  306:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  307:     Config.
  308: 
  309: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  310:    C = configuration(Group),
  311:    B = basic_group(Group),
  312:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  313:         skip ->
  314:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  315:         Config0 ->
  316:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  317:                    [Group, C, B]),
  318:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  319:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  320:     end.
  321: 
  322: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  323:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  324:     case C of
  325:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  326:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  327:         _ ->
  328:             Config0
  329:     end.
  330: 
  331: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  332:     delete_users(Config),
  333:     C = configuration(Group),
  334:     B = basic_group(Group),
  335:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  336: 
  337: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  338:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  339: 
  340: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  341:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  342:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  343:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  344:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  345:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  346:     Config;
  347: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  348:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  349:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  350:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  351:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  352:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  353:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  354:     Config;
  355: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  356:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  357:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  358:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  359:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  360:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  361:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  362:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  363:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  364:     Config;
  365: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  366:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  367:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  368:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  369:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  370:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  371:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  372:     Config;
  373: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  374:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  377:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  378:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  379:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  380:     Config;
  381: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  382:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  383:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  387:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  388:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  389:     Config;
  390: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  391:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  392:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  393:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  398:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  399:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  400:     Config;
  401: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  402:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  403:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  405:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  406:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  407:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  408:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  409:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  410:     Config;
  411: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  412:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  413:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  414:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  415:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  419:     Config;
  420: 
  421: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  425:     Config;
  426: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  427:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  432:     Config;
  433: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  439:     Config;
  440: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  445:     Config;
  446: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [muc]),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  451:     Config;
  452: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  458:     Config;
  459: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  466:     Config;
  467: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  473:     Config;
  474: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  480:     Config;
  481: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  486:     Config;
  487: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  492:     Config;
  493: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  499:     Config;
  500: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  504:     Config;
  505: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  506:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  511:     Config;
  512: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  517:     Config;
  518: init_modules(odbc_dirty_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs, [pm]),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  523:     Config;
  524: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  525:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  530:     Config;
  531: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  532:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  537:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  538:     Config;
  539: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  540:     skip;
  541: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  545:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  546:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  547:     Config.
  548: 
  549: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  550:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  551:     Config.
  552: 
  553: mam_modules() ->
  554:     [mod_mam,
  555:      mod_mam_muc,
  556:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  557:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  558:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  559:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  560:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  561:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  562:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  563:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  564:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  565:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  566:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  567:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  568:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  569:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  570:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  571: 
  572: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  573:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  574:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  575:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  576:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  577: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  578:     Config;
  579: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  580:     Config;
  581: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  582:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  583: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  584:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  585:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  586: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  587:     clean_archives(Config);
  588: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  589:     clean_archives(Config).
  590: 
  591: 
  592: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  593:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  594:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  595:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  596:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  597:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  598:                                        ],
  599:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  600:                  _ ->
  601:                      ConfigIn
  602:              end,
  603:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  604: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  605:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  606: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  607:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  608: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  609:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  610: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  611:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  612: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  613:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  614:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  615: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  616:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  617:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  618: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  619:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  620:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  621: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  622:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  623:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  624: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  625:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  626:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  627: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  628:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  629: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  630:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  631: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  632:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  633: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  634:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  635: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  636:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  637:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  638: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  639:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  640: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  641:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  642: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  643:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  644: 
  645: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  646:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  647:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  648:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  649:         _ ->
  650:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  651:     end.
  652: 
  653: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  654:     destroy_room(Config),
  655:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  656: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  657:     destroy_room(Config),
  658:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  659: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  660:     destroy_room(Config),
  661:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  662: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  663:     destroy_room(Config),
  664:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  665: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  666:     destroy_room(Config),
  667:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  668: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  669:     destroy_room(Config),
  670:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  671: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  672:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  673: 
  674: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  675:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  676:     orelse
  677:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  678:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  679:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  680: 
  681: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  682:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  683: 
  684: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  685:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  686: 
  687: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  688:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  689:         non_existing -> ok;
  690:         false        -> ok;
  691:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  692:     end.
  693: 
  694: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  695:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  696:     ok.
  697: 
  698: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  699:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  700:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  701:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  702:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  703:     Result ->
  704:         Result
  705:     end.
  706: 
  707: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  708:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  709:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  710:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  711: 
  712: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  713: %% Group name helpers
  714: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  715: 
  716: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  717:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  718: 
  719: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  720: configuration(Group) ->
  721:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  722: 
  723: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  724: %% will be tested.
  725: %%
  726: %% Example:
  727: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  728: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  729: %% @end
  730: make_greedy(List) ->
  731:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  732: 
  733: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  734: basic_group(Group) ->
  735:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  736: 
  737: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  738:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  739:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  740:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  741: 
  742: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  743:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  744: 
  745: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  746:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  747:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  748:         true -> PrefixA;
  749:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  750:     end.
  751: 
  752: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  753:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  754: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  755:     Target.
  756: 
  757: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  758:     Tail.
  759: 
  760: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  761: %% Adhoc tests
  762: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  763: 
  764: %% Querying the archive for messages
  765: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  766:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  767:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  768:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  769:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  770:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  771:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  772:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  773:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  774:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  775:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  776:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  777:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  778:         ok
  779:         end,
  780:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  781:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  782:                       ],
  783:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  784:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  785: 
  786: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  787:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  788:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  789:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  790: 
  791:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  792: 
  793:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  794:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  795:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  796:         ok
  797:         end,
  798:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  799: 
  800: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  801:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  802:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  803:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  804: 
  805:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  806: 
  807:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  808:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  809:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  810: 
  811:         ok
  812:         end,
  813:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  814: 
  815: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  816:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  817:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  818:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  819: 
  820:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  821:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  822:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  823: 
  824:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  825:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  826:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  827: 
  828:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  829:         ok
  830:         end,
  831:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  832: 
  833: archived(Config) ->
  834:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  835:         %% Archive must be empty.
  836:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  837:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  838: 
  839:         %% Bob receives a message.
  840:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  841:         try
  842:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  843:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  844:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  845:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  846:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  847: 
  848:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  849: 
  850:         %% Bob calls archive.
  851:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  852:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  853:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  854:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  855:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  856:         ok
  857:         catch Class:Reason ->
  858:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  859:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  860:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  861:         end
  862:         end,
  863:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  864: 
  865: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  866:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  867:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  868:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  869: 
  870:         %% Bob receives a message.
  871:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  872:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  873:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  874:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  875: 
  876:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  877:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  878:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  879:         ok
  880:         end,
  881:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  882: 
  883: strip_archived(Config) ->
  884:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  885:         %% Archive must be empty.
  886:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  887:         escalus:send(Alice,
  888:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  889:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  890:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  891: 
  892:         %% Bob receives a message.
  893:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  894:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  895:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  896:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  897:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  898:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  899: 
  900:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  901: 
  902:         try
  903:         %% Bob calls archive.
  904:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  905:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  906:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  907:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  908:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  909:         ok
  910:         catch Class:Reason ->
  911:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  912:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  913:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  914:         end
  915:         end,
  916:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  917: 
  918: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  919:     %% rot1
  920:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  921:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  922: 
  923: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  924:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  925:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  926:         true ->
  927:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  928:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  929:         false -> ok
  930:     end,
  931:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  932:         true  -> [S];
  933:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  934:     end.
  935: 
  936: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  937:     Respond;
  938: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  939:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  940:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  941:     %% void()
  942: 
  943: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  944: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  945: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  946: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  947: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  948: policy_violation(Config) ->
  949:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  950:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  951:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  952:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  953:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  954:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  955:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  956:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  957:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  958:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  959:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  960:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  961:         try
  962:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
  963:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
  964:             ok
  965:         catch Class:Reason ->
  966:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  967:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
  968:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  969:         end
  970:         end,
  971:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  972: 
  973: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
  974: offline_message(Config) ->
  975:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
  976:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  977:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
  978:         escalus:send(Alice,
  979:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
  980:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  981:         ok
  982:         end,
  983:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
  984: 
  985:     %% Bob logs in
  986:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  987: 
  988:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
  989:     %% will be delivered automatically.
  990: 
  991:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
  992:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
  993: 
  994:     %% Bob checks his archive.
  995:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  996:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
  997:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
  998: 
  999:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1000: 
 1001: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1002:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1003:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1004:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1005:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1006:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1007:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1008:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1009:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1010:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1011:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1012:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1013:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1014:             ok
 1015:         end,
 1016:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1017: 
 1018: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1019:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1020:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
 1021:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1022:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1023:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
 1024:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1025:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1026:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1027:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1028:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1029:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1030:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1031:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1032:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1033:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1034:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1035:             ok
 1036:         end,
 1037:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1038: 
 1039: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1040:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1041:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1042:             [begin
 1043:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1044:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1045:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1046:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1047:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1048:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1049:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1050:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1051:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1052:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1053:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1054:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1055:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1056:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1057:             ok
 1058:         end,
 1059:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1060: 
 1061: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1062:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1063:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1064:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1065:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1066:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1067:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1068: 
 1069:         %% Bob received presences.
 1070:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1071: 
 1072:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1073:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1074: 
 1075:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1076: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1077: 
 1078:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1079:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1080:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1081:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1082:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1083:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1084:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1085:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1086:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1087:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1088: 
 1089:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1090: 
 1091:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1092:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1093:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1094:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1095:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1096:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1097:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1098:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1099:         ok
 1100:         end,
 1101:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1102: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1103: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1104:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1105:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1106:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1107:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1108:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1109:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1110: 
 1111:         %% Bob received presences.
 1112:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1113: 
 1114:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1115:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1116: 
 1117:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1118:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1119: 
 1120:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1121:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1122:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1123:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1124:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1125:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1126:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1127:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1128:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1129:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1130:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1131:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1132:         ok
 1133:     end,
 1134:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1135: 
 1136: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1137:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1138:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1139:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1140:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1141:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1142:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1143:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1144:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1145: 
 1146:         %% Alice received presences.
 1147:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1148:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1149: 
 1150:         %% Bob received presences.
 1151:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1152: 
 1153:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1154:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1155: 
 1156:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1157:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1158:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1159: 
 1160:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1161: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1162: 
 1163:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1164:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1165:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1166: 
 1167:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1168:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1169: 
 1170:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1171:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1172:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1173: 
 1174:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1175:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1176:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1177:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1178:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1179:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1180:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1181:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1182:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1183:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1184: 
 1185:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1186: 
 1187:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1188: 
 1189:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1190: 
 1191:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1192:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1193:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1194:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1195:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1196:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1197:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1198:         ok
 1199:         end,
 1200:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1201: 
 1202: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1203:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1204:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1205:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1206:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1207:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1208: 
 1209:         %% Bob received presences.
 1210:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1211: 
 1212:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1213:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1214: 
 1215:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1216:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1217:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1218:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1219: 
 1220:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1221:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1222:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1223: 
 1224:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1225:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1226:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1227:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1228:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1229:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1230: 
 1231:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1232:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1233:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1234:         ok
 1235:         end,
 1236:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1237: 
 1238: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1239: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1240:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1241:         %% Send
 1242:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1243:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1244:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1245:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1246:         %%   </query>
 1247:         %% </iq>
 1248:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1249:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1250:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1251:         ok
 1252:         end,
 1253:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1254: 
 1255: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1256:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1257:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1258:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1259:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1260:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1261:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1262:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1263:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1264:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1265:         %% Send
 1266:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1267:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1268:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1269:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1270:         %%   </query>
 1271:         %% </iq>
 1272:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1273:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1274:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1275:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1276:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1277:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1278:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1279:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1280:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1281:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1282:         ok
 1283:         end,
 1284:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1285: 
 1286: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1287:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1288:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1289:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1290:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1291: 
 1292: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1293: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1294: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1295:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1296:         %% Send
 1297:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1298:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1299:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1300:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1301:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1302:         %%       </set>
 1303:         %%   </query>
 1304:         %% </iq>
 1305:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1306:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1307:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1308:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1309:         ok
 1310:         end,
 1311:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1312: 
 1313: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1314:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1315:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1316:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1317: 
 1318:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1319:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1320:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1321:         end,
 1322:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1323: 
 1324: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1325:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1326:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1327:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1328:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1329:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1330:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1331:         ok
 1332:         end,
 1333:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1334: 
 1335: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1336:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1337:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1338:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1339:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1340:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1341:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1342:         ok
 1343:         end,
 1344:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1345: 
 1346: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1347:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1348:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1349:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1350:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1351:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1352:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1353:         ok
 1354:         end,
 1355:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1356: 
 1357: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1358:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1359:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1360:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1361:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1362:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1363:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1364:         ok
 1365:         end,
 1366:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1367: 
 1368: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1369:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1370:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1371:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1372:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1373:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1374:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1375:         ok
 1376:         end,
 1377:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1378: 
 1379: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1380:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1381:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1382:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1383:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1384:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1385:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1386:         ok
 1387:         end,
 1388:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1389: 
 1390: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1391:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1392:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1393:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1394:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1395:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1396:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1397:         ok
 1398:         end,
 1399:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1400: 
 1401: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1402:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1403:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1404:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1405:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1406:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1407:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1408:         ok
 1409:         end,
 1410:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1411: 
 1412: 
 1413: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1414:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1415:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1416:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1417:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1418:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1419:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1420:         ok
 1421:         end,
 1422:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1423: 
 1424: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1425:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1426:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1427:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1428:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1429:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1430:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1431:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1432:         ok
 1433:         end,
 1434:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1435: 
 1436: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1437:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1438:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1439:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1440:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1441:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1442:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1443:         ok
 1444:         end,
 1445:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1446: 
 1447: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1448: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1449: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1450:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1451:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1452:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1453:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1454:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1455:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1456:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1457:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1458:         ok
 1459:         end,
 1460:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1461: 
 1462: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1463: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1464:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1465:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1466:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1467:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1468:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1469:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1470:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1471:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1472:         ok
 1473:         end,
 1474:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1475: 
 1476: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1477:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1478: 
 1479: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1480:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1481:         true ->
 1482:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1483:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1484:         _ ->
 1485:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1486:     end.
 1487: 
 1488: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1489:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1490:         true ->
 1491:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1492:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1493:         _ ->
 1494:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1495:     end.
 1496: 
 1497: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1498:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1499:         %% Send
 1500:         %%
 1501:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1502:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1503:         %%     <always>
 1504:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1505:         %%     </always>
 1506:         %%     <never>
 1507:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1508:         %%     </never>
 1509:         %%   </prefs>
 1510:         %% </iq>
 1511:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1512:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1513:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1514:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1515: 
 1516:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1517:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1518: 
 1519:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1520:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1521:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1522:         ok
 1523:         end,
 1524:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1525: 
 1526: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1527: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1528: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1529: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1530: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1531:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1532:         %% Send
 1533:         %%
 1534:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1535:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1536:         %%     <always>
 1537:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1538:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1539:         %%     </always>
 1540:         %%   </prefs>
 1541:         %% </iq>
 1542:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1543:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1544:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1545:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1546:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1547: 
 1548:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1549:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1550: 
 1551:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1552:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1553:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1554:         ok
 1555:         end,
 1556:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1557: 
 1558: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1559:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1560:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1561:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1562:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1563:         try
 1564:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1565:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1566:         ok
 1567:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1568:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1569:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1570:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1571:         end
 1572:         end,
 1573:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1574: 
 1575: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1576: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1577:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1578:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1579:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1580:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1581:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1582:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1583:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1584:         ok
 1585:         end,
 1586:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1587: 
 1588: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1589:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1590:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1591:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1592:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1593:         %% when it is not specified.
 1594:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1595:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1596:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1597:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1598:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1599:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1600:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1601:         ok
 1602:         end,
 1603:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1604: 
 1605: result_iq() ->
 1606:     #xmlel{
 1607:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1608:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1609:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1610: 
 1611: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1612: %% Helpers
 1613: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1614: 
 1615: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1616: 
 1617: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1618: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1619: 
 1620: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1621:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1622:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1623:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1624:     }]).
 1625: 
 1626: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1627:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1628:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1629:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1630:        children = skip_undefined([
 1631:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1632:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1633:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1634:     }]).
 1635: 
 1636: 
 1637: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1638:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1639: 
 1640: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1641:     [];
 1642: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1643:     [{K, V}].
 1644: 
 1645: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1646:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1647: 
 1648: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1649:     undefined;
 1650: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1651:     #xmlel{
 1652:         name = <<"start">>,
 1653:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1654: 
 1655: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1656:     undefined;
 1657: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1658:     #xmlel{
 1659:         name = <<"end">>,
 1660:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1661: 
 1662: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1663:     undefined;
 1664: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1665:     #xmlel{
 1666:         name = <<"with">>,
 1667:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1668: 
 1669: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1670: %% a certain query.
 1671: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1672:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1673:                               undefined, undefined,
 1674:                               undefined, undefined).
 1675: 
 1676: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1677:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1678:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1679:                               undefined, undefined).
 1680: 
 1681: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1682:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1683:                               Start, Stop,
 1684:                               undefined, undefined).
 1685: 
 1686: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1687:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1688:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1689: 
 1690: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1691:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1692: 
 1693: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1694:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1695:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1696: 
 1697: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1698:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1699:        name = <<"query">>,
 1700:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1701:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1702:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1703:        children = skip_undefined([
 1704:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1705:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1706:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1707:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1708:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1709:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1710:     }]).
 1711: 
 1712: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1713:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1714: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1715:     [].
 1716: 
 1717: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1718:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1719: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1720:     [].
 1721: 
 1722: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1723:     [];
 1724: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1725:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1726:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1727:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1728:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1729:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1730: 
 1731: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1732:     undefined;
 1733: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1734:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1735:            children = skip_undefined([
 1736:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1737:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1738:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1739: 
 1740: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1741: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1742: 
 1743: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1744:     undefined;
 1745: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1746:     #xmlel{
 1747:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1748:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1749: 
 1750: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1751:     undefined;
 1752: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1753:     #xmlel{
 1754:         name = <<"index">>,
 1755:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1756: 
 1757: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1758:     undefined;
 1759: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1760:     #xmlel{
 1761:         name = <<"max">>,
 1762:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1763: 
 1764: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1765:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1766:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1767:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1768:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1769: 
 1770: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1771:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1772:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1773:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1774: 
 1775: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1776:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1777:     A =:= Raw.
 1778: 
 1779: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1780: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1781: 
 1782: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 1783:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1784:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1785:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1786:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 1787:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1788:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1789:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1790:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1791:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 1792:     }]).
 1793: 
 1794: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1795:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1796:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1797:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1798:     }]).
 1799: 
 1800: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1801: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1802:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1803: 
 1804: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1805:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1806: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1807:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1808:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1809: 
 1810: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1811: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1812: 
 1813: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1814:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1815:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1816:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1817:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1818:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1819: 
 1820: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1821:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1822:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1823:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1824:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1825:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1826:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1827: 
 1828: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 1829:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1830:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1831: 
 1832: 
 1833: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1834:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1835:     M#forwarded_message{
 1836:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1837:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1838: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1839:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1840:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1841:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1842:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1843:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1844:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1845:                 M1, Children).
 1846: 
 1847: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1848:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1849:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1850: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1851: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1852:     M.
 1853: 
 1854: %% Num is 1-based.
 1855: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1856:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1857:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1858:     Id.
 1859: 
 1860: 
 1861: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1862: %%
 1863: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1864: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1865: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
