 1866: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1867: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1868: %%     []}]
 1869: %%
 1870: %%
 1871: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1872: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1873: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1874: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1875: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1876: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1877: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1878: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1879: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1880: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1881: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1882: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1883: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1884: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1885: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1886:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1887:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1888:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1889:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1890:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1891:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1892: 
 1893: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1894:                      IQ) ->
 1895:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1896: 
 1897: 
 1898: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1899:                                   children = Children},
 1900:                            IQ) ->
 1901:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1902: 
 1903: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1904:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1905:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1906:                                IQ) ->
 1907:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1908:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1909:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1910:             end,
 1911:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1912: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1913:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1914:                                IQ) ->
 1915:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1916: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1917:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1918:                                IQ) ->
 1919:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1920: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1921: 
 1922: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1923: 
 1924: 
 1925: 
 1926: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1927:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1928:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1929: 
 1930: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1931:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1932:                            IQ) ->
 1933:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1934:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1935:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1936: 
 1937: 
 1938: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1939:                                         children = Children},
 1940:                                  IQ) ->
 1941:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1942: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1943:                                         children = Children},
 1944:                                  IQ) ->
 1945:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1946: 
 1947: 
 1948: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1949:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 1950:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1951: 
 1952: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1953: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1954: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1955: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1956: %%   </error>
 1957: %% </iq>
 1958: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1959:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1960: 
 1961:     IQ = #error_iq{
 1962:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 1963:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1964:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1965: 
 1966: 
 1967: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 1968:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 1969:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 1970:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1971:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 1972: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 1973:     IQ.
 1974: 
 1975: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 1976:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 1977:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 1978: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 1979:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 1980: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 1981:     IQ.
 1982: 
 1983: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1984: %% Helpers (muc)
 1985: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1986: 
 1987: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 1988:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1989:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1990:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 1991:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 1992:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 1993: 
 1994: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 1995:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 1996:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 1997:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 1998:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 1999:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 2000: 
 2001: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2002:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2003:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2004:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2005:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2006: 
 2007: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2008:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2009:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2010:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2011:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2012:         _ -> ok
 2013:     end.
 2014: 
 2015: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2016:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2017:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2018:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2019:                    Room, Nick).
 2020: 
 2021: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2022:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2023: 
 2024: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2025:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2026: 
 2027: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2028:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2029: 
 2030: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2031:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2032: 
 2033: 
 2034: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2035:     Pid = self(),
 2036:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2037:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2038:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2039:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2040:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2041: 
 2042:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2043:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2044: 
 2045:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2046:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2047:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2048:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2049:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2050:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2051:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2052:         %% Get whole history.
 2053:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2054:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2055:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2056:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2057:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2058:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2059:         ok
 2060:         end,
 2061:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2062:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2063:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2064:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2065: 
 2066:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2067:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2068: 
 2069: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2070:     Pid = self(),
 2071:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2072:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2073:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2074:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2075:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2076:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2077:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2078:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2079:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2080:         %% Get whole history.
 2081:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2082:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2083:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2084:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2085:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2086:         ok
 2087:         end,
 2088:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2089:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2090:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2091:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2092: 
 2093:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2094:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2095: 
 2096: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2097:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2098: 
 2099: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2100:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2101:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2102: 
 2103: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2104:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2105:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2106:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2107:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2108:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2109:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2110:     Config.
 2111: 
 2112: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2113:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2114:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2115:     timer:sleep(500),
 2116:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2117:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2118:     Config.
 2119: 
 2120: serv_users(Config) ->
 2121:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2122:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2123: 
 2124: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2125:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2126:     {Server, Username}.
 2127: 
 2128: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2129: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2130:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2131:        0 -> ok;
 2132:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2133:     end.
 2134: 
 2135: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2136: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2137:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2138:        0 -> ok;
 2139:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2140:     end.
 2141: 
 2142: 
 2143: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2144:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2145: 
 2146: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2147:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2148: 
 2149: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2150:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2151: 
 2152: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2153:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2154: 
 2155: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2156:     %% Do not care
 2157:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2158:     ok.
 2159: 
 2160: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2161:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2162: 
 2163: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2164:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2165:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2166:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2167:     try
 2168:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2169:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2170:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2171:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2172:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2173:         ok
 2174:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2175:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2176:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2177:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2178:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2179:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2180:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2181:     end.
 2182: 
 2183: 
 2184: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2185:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2186:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2187:     try
 2188:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2189:         ok
 2190:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2191:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2192:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2193:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2194:     end.
 2195: 
 2196: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2197:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2198:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2199:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2200:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2201:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2202:     end.
 2203: 
 2204: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2205:     random:seed(now()),
 2206:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2207:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2208:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2209:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2210:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2211:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2212:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2213:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2214:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2215:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2216:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2217: 
 2218: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2219:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2220:         ID1 =< ID2
 2221:     end,
 2222:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2223: 
 2224: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2225:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2226:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2227:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2228:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2229:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2230: 
 2231: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2232:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2233: 
 2234:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2235:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2236: 
 2237: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2238:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2239:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2240:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2241:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2242:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2243:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2244:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2245: 
 2246: random_time() ->
 2247:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2248:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2249:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2250: 
 2251: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2252:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2253:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2254:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2255:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2256: 
 2257: 
 2258: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2259:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2260: 
 2261: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2262:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2263:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2264:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2265:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2266:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2267:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2268: 
 2269: archive_message(Args) ->
 2270:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2271: 
 2272: 
 2273: 
 2274: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2275:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2276: 
 2277:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2278:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2279:     R = room_address(Room),
 2280: 
 2281:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2282:     Host = host(),
 2283:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2284:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2285:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2286:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2287:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2288:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2289:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2290:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2291: 
 2292:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2293: 
 2294:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2295: 
 2296:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2297: 
 2298: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2299:     Host = host(),
 2300:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2301: 
 2302: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2303:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2304:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2305:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2306:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2307: 
 2308: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2309: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2310:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2311:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2312: 
 2313: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2314:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2315: 
 2316: 
 2317: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2318:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2319: 
 2320: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2321:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2322:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2323:         Other ->
 2324:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2325:             false
 2326:     end.
 2327: 
 2328: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2329:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2330:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2331:             true;
 2332:         _ ->
 2333:             false
 2334:     end.
 2335: 
 2336: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2337:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2338: 
 2339: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2340:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2341:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2342:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2343:     Client.
 2344: 
 2345: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2346:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2347:         undefined ->
 2348:             ok;
 2349:         Value ->
 2350:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2351:     end.
 2352: 
 2353: 
 2354: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2355: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2356: %%
 2357: %% Messages:
 2358: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2359: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2360: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2361: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2362: %%
 2363: %% Each tuple is
 2364: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2365: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2366: prefs_cases() ->
 2367:     [
 2368:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2369:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2370:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2371:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2372:  
 2373:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2374:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2375:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2376:  
 2377:  
 2378:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2379:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2380:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2381:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2382:  
 2383:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2384:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2385:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2386:  
 2387:  
 2388:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2389:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2390:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2391:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2392:  
 2393:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2394:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2395:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2396:     ].
 2397: 
 2398: 
 2399: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2400:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2401:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2402:         [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2403:         end,
 2404:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2405: 
 2406: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2407:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2408:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2409:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2410: 
 2411:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2412:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2413:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2414: 
 2415:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2416:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2417:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2418: 
 2419:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2420:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2421:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2422:         ok.
 2423: 
 2424: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2425:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2426:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2427:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2428:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2429:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2430:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2431:     %% Messages:
 2432:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2433:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2434:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2435:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2436:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2437:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2438:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2439:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2440:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2441:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2442:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2443:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2444:     %% Get last four archived texts
 2445:     Stanzas = get_last_four_messages(Alice),
 2446:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2447:     Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2448:     ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2449:     ?assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2450:                         [{prefs_state, PrefsState}]),
 2451:     ok.
 2452: 
 2453: get_last_four_messages(Alice) ->
 2454:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2455:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2456:     [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2457:     AllMessages.
 2458: 
 2459: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2460:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2461:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2462:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2463:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2464: 
 2465: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2466:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2467: 
 2468: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2469:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2470:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2471:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 2472: 
 2473: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 2474: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2475:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2476:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases()]
 2477:         end,
 2478:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2479: 
 2480: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 2481: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 2482:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2483:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2484:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 2485: 
 2486:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 2487:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2488: 
 2489:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 2490:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 2491:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 2492:     ok.
